          <title>
            <string language="en">Pedalling a bicycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radeln eines Fahrrades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pédaler une bicyclette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pedalling uma bicicleta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pedalling una bicicletta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Pedalling ένα ποδήλατο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pedalling una bicicleta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a bicycle will slow down by itself unless you keep pedalling</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein Fahrrad selbst 
verlangsamt, es sei denn Sie halten radzueln</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'une bicyclette 
ralentira par elle-même à moins que vous continuiez à pédaler</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que uma bicicleta 
retardará para baixo por se a menos que você se mantiver pedalling</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che una bicicletta 
rallenterà da sè a meno che continuiate a pedalling</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένα ποδήλατο θα 
επιβραδύνει από το εκτός αν συνεχίζετε</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una bicicleta 
retrasará por sí mismo a menos que usted guarde el pedalling</string>
